E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 4/7/1988
Subject: Carlos Quintana learns new position
Carlos Quintana has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Second Base.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 4/24/1988
Subject: Lee Mazzilli is sick...
Diagnosis: Sore Back.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 1-2 weeks.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Wednesday, 4/30/1988
Subject: Mike Macfarlane learns new position
Mike Macfarlane has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Rightfield.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1988
Subject: Progress of Eric King
Dear Sir,
Eric King is doing pretty good at AA Birmingham Barons!
He has an ERA of 2.68, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Progress of Ivan Rodriguez

He has an AVG of .410, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
